title: Human Error (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
itunes:title: Human Error (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
description:
Sajid Javid is the right man to run the Health department, according to Tobias Ellwood, Conservative MP and chair of the Defence Select Committee. He tells Bloomberg's Roger Hearing and Caroline Hepker that the loss of secret MoD papers at a bus stop is down to an individual.

On the Batley and Spen by-election, local people want to extract some promises from their moment in the national spotlight, says Dr Victoria Honeyman, associate professor of British politics at Leeds University.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
